name: Hardware
definition: Physical components and electronic circuits that make up the tangible parts of a computer system

name: Software
definition: Programs and operating systems that provide instructions for hardware to execute tasks

name: Central Processing Unit
definition: Main processor that executes instructions performs calculations and manages data flow in the computer system

name: Memory Hierarchy
definition: Structured levels of data storage ranging from fast registers to slow permanent storage

name: Input Output System
definition: Components and interfaces that enable communication between the computer and external devices

name: Control Unit
definition: Component that directs CPU operations by fetching decoding and executing instructions from memory

name: Arithmetic Logic Unit
definition: Component that performs arithmetic operations like addition and logical operations like comparisons

name: Registers
definition: Small high-speed storage locations within the CPU that temporarily hold data during processing

name: Instruction Decoder
definition: Circuit that interprets binary instruction codes and determines what operations the CPU should perform

name: Opcode Decoder
definition: Circuit that decodes the operation code portion of an instruction to determine the operation type

name: Adder Circuit
definition: Digital circuit that performs binary addition operations on data

name: Full Adder
definition: Logic circuit that adds three binary bits including carry input and produces sum and carry output

name: Logic Gates
definition: Fundamental electronic circuits that perform basic Boolean operations on binary inputs

name: AND Gate
definition: Digital gate that outputs true only when all inputs are true implementing logical conjunction

name: Accumulator
definition: Register that stores intermediate arithmetic and logic results during CPU operations

name: Cache Memory
definition: Small fast memory that stores frequently accessed data to reduce access time to main memory

name: Main Memory
definition: Primary volatile memory that stores currently executing programs and data for CPU access

name: Secondary Storage
definition: Permanent non-volatile storage devices that retain data when power is off

name: L1 Cache
definition: Smallest fastest cache located directly on the CPU chip with lowest latency

name: Data Cache
definition: Portion of L1 cache dedicated to storing frequently accessed data values

name: RAM Modules
definition: Physical memory modules containing dynamic random access memory chips for temporary data storage

name: DRAM Chips
definition: Dynamic RAM integrated circuits that store data as electrical charges in capacitors

name: Memory Cells
definition: Individual storage units within DRAM consisting of transistor and capacitor pairs

name: Transistor
definition: Semiconductor device that acts as electronic switch to control access to stored charge

name: Capacitor
definition: Electronic component that stores electrical charge representing binary data bit

name: Solid State Drive
definition: Storage device using flash memory chips with no moving parts for faster data access

name: NAND Flash Cells
definition: Memory cells that store bits using floating-gate transistors

name: I O Controllers
definition: Specialized processors that manage data transfer between CPU and peripheral devices

name: Peripheral Devices
definition: External hardware components that provide input to or receive output from the computer

name: Graphics Controller
definition: Specialized processor that generates video signals and manages display output to monitors

name: Keyboard
definition: Input device with keys that converts user keystrokes into digital signals for the computer

name: Monitor
definition: Output device that displays visual information from computer as text images and video

name: Frame Buffer
definition: Memory area that stores pixel data before being sent to the display

name: Pixel Matrix
definition: 2D grid representing color and brightness values for each pixel on screen

name: Subpixel
definition: Component representing individual red, green, or blue light elements in a display pixel
